column17:
Kenzo Flower Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3900

Vibrant and vivacious a beguiling scent that transcends you to a level of freshness and confidence. The lovely woman walks with a wistful pace and a free spirit with a bit of Kenzo Flower. Created by Alberto Morillas this invigorating Eau De Parfum is made for the lovely brand of Kenzo.

The top note opens with tangy notes of blackcurrant hazy-sweet hawthorn graceful and light notes of Bulgarian rose along with zesty notes of mandarin orange. Moving into the heart the sweet balsam of opoponax exotic notes of jasmine powdery notes of violet and the sweet essence of rose gives you a feeling of floating on a gossamer cloud. Finally creamy rich vanilla melts into soothingly heavy musk and smoky swirls of incense to give an intense base note. A bouquet of flowers explode into a luxury fragrance that you can wear at any time of the day. Resonating the stark and simple beauty of nature this fragrance comes in a svelte and transparent vial with a stopper with a red flower. The clear fragrance glows and complements the long green stem that runs down the length of the vial. A spritz of Kenzo Flower and wrap yourself in nature’s fragrant embrace.

column17:
Kenzo Jungle Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.5954

For the woman who is unafraid of the unknown and loves to push the boundaries beyond those set for her by the society famed designer Kenzo Takada presents an ode in the form of Kenzo Jungle. A fragrance that seeks to capture the essence of the great unexplored wilderness it is made for the woman who loves to experiment with her options. The luxury Eau de Parfum is perfect for daily wear; one spritz transforms just another dull day into an exciting adventure that you can look forward to. The fragrance designed around the themes of nature and flower   is named after the first Kenzo boutique in Paris and special for more reasons than one.

Created by famed perfumer Dominique Ropion Kenzo Jungle is a delicious tingle of notes created by accords of tangy mandarin orange and spicy cardamom. The spiciness is balanced by the soothing notes of violet palm leaf which roots down the fragrance onto your skin and leaves a lingering trail that will last in your memory long after the dry down fades into oblivion. The heady combination of spices and florals is contained in an elegant rectangular bottle with a unique stopper that is designed in keeping with the jungle theme. The intricate leaf and the elephant carved onto the stopper adds aesthetic value to the fragrance and makes the flacon a collectible. Launched in 1996 Kenzo Jungle takes you on an exciting journey through the wilderness.

column17:
Kenzo Flower Essentielle Eau de Parfum - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.6500

Delicate and dainty for the woman whose softness amazes Kenzo Takada presents Flower Essentielle. A luxury fragrance that captures your heart and your imagination with its exquisitely ethereal beauty it combines florals of the most soothing nature and presents you with an Eau de Parfum that is gossamery in consistency and graceful in wear. She is a woman who loves to be a part of everyone’s life and derives happiness from the small acts of love that she is able to make them smile with. And this lovely scent envelops her in its welcome arms to comfort her when she is worn out.

Launched in July 2009 Kenzo Flower Essentielle carries accords of the exquisitely exotic Damascus rose that even alone spreads its magic over your senses. Jasmine adds its redolence to the fragrance even as the deeply settling nature of powdery musk calms you down along with the delicious comfort of vanilla. Incense lends a smoky texture to the fragrance even as black pepper adds a bit of spice to make it interesting. The lusciousness of pink berries adds a final touch to the perfume which is capable of holding its own against the most exquisite of fragrances that man can challenge it with. Typically Kenzo Takada style the flacon that contains the fragrance has a long curved body that accentuates the note of grace and elegance. Embrace your femininity with Kenzo Flower Essentielle made for the woman who is completely in sync with who she is and what she wants from life.

Classified as floral-aquatic Kenzo is bright and fresh. Frosted mint lends its purity and complexity lotus reveals its clarity. column17:
Kenzo L' Eau Par Pour Femme Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2670

The delicate damsel who walks in quiet elegance she is sculpted out of every mans imagination. When she walks through you are reminded of a slim glistening stream of water flowing and enriching its path. It is for this lovely woman that Kenzo L’Eau Par Pour Femme is created. A waft of this luxury Eau De Toilette and Olivier Cresp has fashioned you into the woman dreams are made of.

Like the soft petals unfold to bring you a beautiful flower that basks in the gleam of the sunlight the light and sweet notes of lotus add a wonderful nuance to this fragrance. Cool and refreshing hints of mint bathes you in a tranquil aura like a soothing balm to your soul. All tied up together with an intricate web of pink pepper that acts as a sweet spice that gives an intriguing definition to this odorous mix. Created to melt into your skin this floral fragrance acts as an olfactory symphony that takes your breath away. For those serene mornings where you feel so light as if you’re floating on a cloud this perfume is ideal. A whiff of this delicate and entrancing aroma is like that intriguing narration before the story begins.
